glosses: a male given name from Arabic, equivalent to English Abraham

etymology:
Etymology tree
Biblical Hebrew אַבְרָהָם (ʔaḇrɔhɔm)bor.
Aramaic אַבְרָהָם (ʾaḇrāhām)bor.
Arabic إِبْرَاهِيم (ʔibrāhīm)der.
Ottoman Turkish ابراهیم (İbrahim)
Turkish İbrahim
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish ابراهیم (İbrahim), from Arabic إِبْرَاهِيم (ʔibrāhīm), borrowed from Aramaic אַבְרָהָם (ʾaḇrāhām), borrowed from Biblical Hebrew אַבְרָהָם (ʔaḇrɔhɔm).
